com.bmwcarit.barefoot.tracker

Class TrackerServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util.AbstractServer
      • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.tracker.TrackerServer

  • public class TrackerServer
extends AbstractServer
    Tracker server (stand-alone) for Hidden Markov Model online map matching. It is a AbstractServer that performs online map matching; and is configurable with a properties file. It pushes updates via a ZeroMQ publisher port to subscribing listeners.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util.AbstractServer

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackerServer

        public TrackerServer(Properties properties,
                     RoadMap map)
        Creates a TrackerServer object as stand-alone online map matching server. The provided Properties object may provide the following properties:
        • server properties: see AbstractServer.AbstractServer(Properties, ResponseFactory)
        • matcher.radius.max (see Matcher.setMaxRadius(double))
        • matcher.distance.max (see Matcher.setMaxDistance(double))
        • matcher.lambda (see Matcher.setLambda(double))
        • matcher.sigma (see Matcher.setSigma(double))
        • tracker.port (optional, default: 1235)
        • tracker.ttl (seconds, optional, default: 60, sets time to live of state information for tracked objects which is infinite if set to zero)
        Parameters:
        properties - Properties object with (optional) server and matcher settings.
        map - RoadMap object with the map to be matched with.
